SELECT cr.seq ,mm.id as creator ,cr.crewName ,cr.sports ,cr.location ,cr.crewMemberNum ,cr.startTime ,cr.endTime ,cr.detail ,cr.viewCount ,cr.locationDetail ,cr.playDate ,upcr.uuidName ,upcr.path FROM crew cr JOIN member mm ON cr.creator = mm.seq JOIN uploadedCrew upcr ON cr.seq = upcr.pSeq WHERE 1=1 AND cr.creator = #{creator}

SELECT cr.seq ,mm.id ,cr.creator ,cr.crewName ,cr.sports ,cr.location ,cr.crewMemberNum ,cr.startTime ,cr.endTime ,cr.detail ,cr.viewCount ,cr.locationDetail ,cr.playDate ,upmm.path ,upmm.uuidName ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crMember WHERE 1=1 AND crSeq = #{seq}) AS crmmCount FROM crew cr LEFT JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = cr.creator LEFT JOIN uploadedMember upmm ON upmm.pSeq = mm.seq WHERE 1=1 AND cr.seq = #{seq}

SELECT seq FROM crew ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
